reviews: Azulik is the best hotel I’ve ever stayed in. Highly recommend the Sea Villa. Most beautiful room I’ve ever experienced. Also went to KinToh for the Monkey nest experience for dinner & we had Luis Miguel as our server & he was always on top of it. Very knowledgeable & personable. Highly recommend requesting Luis Miguel as your server if you ever go to KinToh for dinner. I will no doubt come back to this beautiful resort.

If you are a nature lover this is the place to be.As eco friendly as can be . It’s like Mother Nature is embracing you in every possible way .Each nook  and corner is so artistically curated . Like someone took a lot of pains in doing up the resort .As if that wasn’t enough , they have the best staff ever .Vincent at the desk, Gabriella the supervisor, Manuel the help desk and not to  forget the helpful concierge, all are welcoming , happy people. It was a delight to be a part of this family .Will recommend to everyone and will be back soon .

We stayed in the Moon Villa with Hugo and Luis as our butlers. Absolutely unreal. Truly. From the first step into the resort and into our villa, we were totally mind blown. We cancelled our excursions and just stayed at the hotel and enjoyed the spa services (Samanta and our masseuses were amazing), activities at the resort, the private beach, and the different hot tubs in the villa. The food was also delicious. The tarot card reading and inner child meditation were fantastic. Hugo was above and beyond helping with reservations, transportation, and everything in between. He was always at the ready and so quick to help! Truly a five star experience in the jungle. We’ll be back.

Nice stay, cool concept. Thanks to Areli and Karan for looking after us.worth spending a few days to experience the concept , nice exclusive atmosphere and friendly service.  Sunset drinks are fun and cool view from the terrace. Food is good

Our stay at Azulik was awesome!!  We loved the service, the Angels attention, restaurant, food, beach club and even the luggage service from Jaime Hernandez was incredible.  Everything at your fingertips and much more.  The privacy, the ceremonies was unforgettable.  We also enjoyed the spa and massages with one of the most experienced therapists.  The Angel services, anything you need they are on top of your request.  We would definitely be returning to this resort for an unforgettable experience.  Javier A. Avendano

One of the best experience I’ve had in my life was at Azvlik staying at their Sky Villa! Gorgeous property, rooms, views and super welcoming staff. Our angel Regina went above and beyond to make things happen for us! I highly recommend staying here atleast once in your life!

Absolutely magical. We stayed there in February 2023, where I proposed to my now fiancé. Not only is the properly incredible and magical but the employees at Azulik are truly world class.  The concierge team (known as the Angels) are truly the most helpful and lovely people I've ever met.Regina and Karen (2 of the angels) are incredible and made our stay/proposal an incredible experience. The entire Angels team are amazing. They organized wine, chocolate, and rose petals for our room. Decorated our dinning table at one of the "nests" with rose petals, among many, many other things.  Also, Gabriella at the front desk is also fantastic. | just wish the English language had an ever stronger word to describe how incredibly lovely and helpful the folks at azulik are.  Highly

Excellent service, especially from bell guys who carry bags very far without carts. Raoul and Alejandro. Also…Marysol, Luis, Karen, and Diana were the most excellent service angels! We will stay again!

Amazing, friendly stuff working in Azulik, especially the Angels team. Very helpful and welcoming. Special thanks to Areli. Thank you for a wonderful stay. Definitely we’ll come back. The service in this place has left us very satisfied

We visited Azulik because we heard that the place is awesome, and that is right; the place is beautiful, but only that. It is incredibly expensive. I mean, we spend real cash on good vacations, but this place is crazy, and the service was not good at all. If you are paying 22/25 USD for 1 drink and 60 for an entrée, you expect spectacular service, and this wasn't the case. We were taking pictures at the nets and hammocks when we had the ugliest and most disgusting experience. We realized that a man was staring at us in a bad way. It was uncomfortable and awkward. At first, I thought that it was only me seeing that guy, but then my friends told me exactly the same. The worst part is that he is part of the staff, a man with really short hair in a black shirt. He didn't have a name

First off, I would like to thank Marisol for making this stay an absolute dream!  When we first arrived Marisol gave us a tour. I pulled her aside and mentioned I had plans to propose and wanted a photo shoot to capture the moment. She was super excited and got it all setup within just a few hours. The next day everything went as planned and we couldn’t ask for a more magical moment. Later that afternoon we went back to the room and it was decorated with rose petals with a bottle of wine ready for us to celebrate. My Fiancé and I would like to thank Marisol from the bottom of our hearts… we hope to see her and her beautiful smile again soon! We stayed in a Sea Villa and the view was amazing. We lit candles early so we didn’t have to light them in the dark. There is only one

From the moment we stepped out of the taxi and walked into the front area to check in we knew this was an extraordinary place to be.. We were greeted very politely and also they performed a mayan spiritual ritual to welcome us and we loved it. On the way to our ocean front villa the walk there was jaw dropping and we were in total amazement and how beautiful this place truly is.. The ocean front villa was truly amazing place and the deck area was right above the rocks where the Waves crashed onto the rocks right below you and the breeze was amazing. The beach area was absolutely wonderful and the service was great drinks were very tasty. The restaurants are definitely something to see it was unbelievable and hard to even put into words how beautiful they were The food was

Beautiful place! Unique atmosphere! We booked a sea villa which was right on the beach with a beautiful view and huge balcony. Loved the complimentary tarot reading with Federico and yoga every morning at the hotel!

We visited the beach club in February 2023, its hard to put into words how stunning this property is. However the beach club is average at best, for the $200 USD we paid for the day we were very disappointed with the basic beach club offerings. The DJ finally showed up at around 1 pm and you could barely hear the music, the beach area itself is not exciting or posh. Also, beware of the scam the servers run, we asked for Stoli vodka cocktails and were charged for Grey Goose on our bill- this is unacceptable and in Tulum this was not our first encounter with this scam. Thankfully after spending 45 minutes with the manager we left with a $100 refund.

It's difficult to sum up Azulik as the experience is certainly unique. For once, the photos don't do it justice. The villas emerge from the trees and sit beautifully and comfortably alongside them. The museum is a rare and surprising treat. The staff and experiences are all truly magical from the welcoming Mayan ritual (original scpetic/massive convert; honestly) to the incredible massage by the Caribean Sea. However, for us there is only one star of the show: Luis. He was incredible - there was nothing too small that he hadn't sorted for us, whether that be the best table at the hotel's incredibel restaurants, arranging our cabana every day and of course sorting our cool bikes so we could explore. Thanks Luis - you're a legend. Name checks also to Rufino and Melissa from the

It’s our 4 visit to Azulik .  The other time we loved it BUT -  It seems that the administración only see how to take your money without return you expirenice back .  Awful hotel , don’t spend your money here .  It’s architecture y beautiful yes - but only this .  The stuff gives you a feeling of money money money all day . The guest is only having $ sign and even for a topaste they charge like 25 dollars 😳.   Really do not recommend them , go to see the sunset

I am having a hard time with this review. On the one hand, this property is insanely unique and beautiful. The restaurants are so well designed, the staff is amazing, the food delicious. On the other, I would not stay at this hotel a second time.  Check in was easy, they valeted our car, took our bags, checked us in and gave us a tour, everyone was very friendly and helpful.   The store at the entrance is beautiful. The design and architecture is like nothing I have ever seen. Check it out.   Now, lets start with the entrance to the hotel, the wood logs that make up the bridge and pathway to get in and out are so cute, but next to impossible to walk on. You most definitely could not wear any type of heels on this property, even sandals were difficult, barefoot kind of hurt on

Maricarmen, Rey, Kiki w/ Azulik Healing gave my family & I a great experience. They were very polite, & kind. After a crazy pass couple of weeks experience was just what I needed. I really appreciate the the good energy from Maricarmen. Her and her  staff were very helpful. Overall great place for fine dining and Healing. I will definitely return to Azulik Kin Toh..  Thanks

I enjoyed the hotel and the experience overall. One thing i wanna address, the hotel room doesn’t have electricity at night. So you will only be relying on the candle lights after sunset. But I understand they wanna maintain the solemn atmosphere of the place. But it would be nice to have at least one source of light at night.

Honestly, I didnt fully understood how much I needed the energy of this hotel. After 20+ years of military service, one hour of yoga with "Sergio" every morning was perfect to recalibrate my thoughs and timing"a most do". He took the time to remind me of the importance of living in the present and not in the past or worrying about the future. The healing the inner child session was much neede as well and the best part, it was all inlcuded"free". This place is desing to liberate any stressor you may carry still. The entire staff is fully aware and will go out of their way to make you feel at peace. Recommended 100% ...Dont forget to watch the sunset at the rooftop lounge.💛🔥🏝🌞Viva Mexico 🇲🇽

My cousin booked us a room, we stood over an hour waiting in lobby, they couldn’t find our reservations, after they found it they say that reservation was on another person my friends son n that person had to call in and to ad us to the reservation, after all of that they told us that that not enough that he has to call espedia n talk to them, after we did all of that they told us that no more then 2 people are permitted in the rooms, after they saw us getting off our rented jeep, after they seen us there with our wives anger seem them in them waiting with us, it was a bad experience we had we the manager, he was very rude and maybe racist

If you dont need a pool at your resort, its for you If you want a small and filthy beach, its for you. If you do NOT want air conditioning when you eat dinner, its for you. No electricity except to charge your phone.   No amenities, and over priced. BE CAREFUL

we did not expected to find such a beautiful place in the middle of what we believed was the jungle such a combination between the mystic and magical places, with a out of this world food not to be missed

A big shoutout to Angel's team - Areli, Regina, Hugo, Luis, Leyda for providing us a tour around Azulik! The layout of Azulik was astounding and impressive; a humble entrance but an endless path of amusement once you step inside. The team was able to show us where everything was, and was proactive in helping us try to delay our restaurant reservation with Hartwood. We were also very relieved we did not had to carry our baggages ourselves to our rooms. Most importantly, they were very professional and friendly throughout our time there, and their response time on whatsapp was incredibly quick.

Horrible.  We came for the sunset experience and got the directions to go to the far rooftop (not where we actually wanted to go) not knowing better we went there, paid 700pesos per person got our drink just to realise 2 minutes after this is the wrong one. And asked to go to the right one, but no. Then we had to pay 1000 pesos per person again. We spoke to a manager explaining that we were sent to the wrong place by their staff, but he could not give less of a s**t if he tried. Time after time we were told that we had to pay 2000 Pesos for their mistake. Sunset experience or not. Don’t bother. Service is below what they try to make of themselves. Save your money to buy a nice taco! Not worth the headache of bad service from a greedy unhelpful management.

Azulik was an awesome experience. It really  helps you reconnect with your self, and significant other.  Immediately upon arrival,  Hugo Rodriguez ( an Angel Concierge) help us with all of our trip. From setting up all of our day beach clubs reservations to dinners and what ever access we needed he made it happen. Make sure to ask Hugo when you visit Azulik. It really makes a difference . The property is amazing, plenty of areas to take pics,  won't disappoint.  General serives was great and the food was awesome.  Remember,  there is no light or tv's, but that's the concept . Highly recommend to stay 2 night at least. 10 out of 10.

My friends & I came here, got three separate rooms, & our MONEY WAS STOLEN OUT OF THE SAFE. How can you stay somewhere where your belongings & personal items cannot be trust with the staff! Disgusting

Where do I begin....Azulik was nothing short of AMAZING! This is a truly magical place where you can immerse yourself in the surrounding nature and be taken on a spiritual journey. The Angels team,  Regina, Leyda, Hugo, Areli and Luis make you feel special and right at home. I am forever transformed and sincerely grateful for this spectacular experience.

Mari Carmen did an inner child healing with me and it was beautiful and liberating. I highly recommend anyone to try it. She was very helpful and explained the process of healing the inner child in me. I have gained some knowledge through her and I thank her for that.

The beautiful setting and unique ambiance brought me back for the second time this April. Most things were as I remembered them.  A couple reasons why I recommend Azulik  Service: Very helpful staff, quick and responsive. Front desk and wait staff were very helpful. Hugo was a great help when it came to recommending restaurants and things to do in the area, he definitely went out of his way for us.   Location: Private beach is a huge plus. The villas and the surrounding setting are a one of a kind experience.

Resort was incredible and absolutely stunning. The attention to detail in every area was thoughtfully designed. Hugo in particular was our go-to, who helped guide us through the initial check-in and along our stay with recommendations for dinners and going above and beyond with some photos on our last night throughout different areas of the resort. We did a couple massage at the spa and Charlie and Janie were so great - one of the best massages we’ve ever had. Service throughout the resort was kind and friendly - Raul and James helped with our bags and guiding us out for transportation. Will definitely come back next time we’re in Tulum! Checkout was a breeze and Teresa at the front desk was kind enough to provide us a little souvenir we were asking about to remember the trip by.

A few friends and I were new to Tulum, and would definitely recommend to stay here. Right on Tulum beach, close to all the beach clubs, there's AC and incredibly gorgeous views. A must stay to have the Tulum experience! The service is great and Hugo was so wonderful and helpful!

Such a beautiful hotel with friendly staff. There is A/C and electricity in each of the rooms. The spa is really nice as well. What an experience, I will be back for another stay. Restaurant also nice

Staying at Azvlik was a beautiful and unique experience. My husband and I celebrated our honeymoon there and had a wonderful time! The angel service is top notch; Marisol, Areli, Karen, and Regina were attentive, friendly, and very helpful. The on-site restaurants are delicious! We particularly enjoyed our daily breakfasts at Kin Toh. We enjoyed a few different spa treatments, the traditional Temezcal experience and had an insightful tarot reading from Federico. We did find the beach club a bit over priced and could have done without the jungle trance music but we always had an enjoyable time. Plus, there are a ton of shops and restaurants in walking distance from the hotel. Above all, waking up to the sunrise over the ocean and being immersed in nature was the very best part.

By far the most amazing experience we have ever had.  The rooms are exactly the same as in the pictures and you get everything as promised.  I must say that what makes this hotel so special are not just the rooms and the design , which are unbelievable , there is the staff which is the most amazing staff we have ever met. The concierge team is called the Angels. For your stay, you get assigned with an “angel”. Our angel was Hugo and he was by far the best angel we could ever ask for. Extremely motivated and keen to give us the best experience ever. He was at our service 24/7, he took amazing care of us and booked us all the dinners and night clubs outside Azulik throughout the whole stay. Moreover I need to mention that it never took him over 10 minutes to reply to our texts

Alejandro and Jamie our bell representatives were kind and courteous during our stay at Azulik. They made our stay convenient and simple.  Our spa day was spent with Ms. Catalina and Jamie. We got a couples massage that was one of the best massages I’ve ever had. Very friendly and kind. I will definitely be coming back in the future.

Overall the place is beautiful, our server was extremely nice and a real pleasure.  I was not a fan of the food, I expected more of a selection for food or should I say a variety .  I don't mind paying for good food BUT the food was not good and the price was too high for what they were offering.   I recommend this place for photos only.

a beautiful hotel built at the expense of its employees, it is a pity to find out that many are owed weeks or even months of salary, many resign and continue waiting without any response from the administration, there are many options with better prices and humane treatment with their employees, I would not recommend it to anyone

Beautiful architecture, and wonderful staff. Leyda was such a big help in getting things straight for me getting me all set up in my room and helping me find something to do at night when I was looking for some fun

I did an inner child ceremony with  Enrique ,Charlie y yeinnie  spa it was the best experience I have ever had in my life, I would recommend to anyone. They have made my trip to Mexico incredible and I would return just to see them again. They have given me peace.

The sound healing was beautiful! Everyone is super nice and welcoming, you will be speechless experiencing the place. You will leave very happy and relaxed, I recommend you come to this amazing place!

Azulik is a stunning property. Truly one of a kind and the hospitality is like no other. Jamie, Alejandro, John, and Barak went out of their way to make us feel welcome and were some of the kindest people I’ve ever met. The food at both restaurants was phenomenal and I can recommend staying at this property enough!

We had absolutely amazing time we had in Azulik and it was great to go and experience different things . specially we love our spa with Yasmin and Catalina . Thank you so much for a fantastic experience

We stayed in Azulic for a week. We had a photo shoot there. Charlie & Luis were amazing. Not only we had great photos after but the photo shoot experience was such a fun & memorable time for us! They were so nice and caring!! We highly recommend them :) also Areli helped us a lot to manage this!  Also we also had a great meditation session with Sergio and tarot card experience with Federico which were awesome! Thank you all so much :)

The most zen experience and practice with Eric. I was accompanied by friends and family and we will forever remember this special moment we all shared together! Thank you for the hospitality Marie carmen. Highly recommend if you are in Tulum and want to experience a beautiful energy.

Best yoga experience! Such a calming and peaceful experience to share with friends. The instructor, Eric was so helpful and patient with our group. Marie Carmen gave us an energy cleansing at the end of the class. Such a beautiful space.

Excelente!   An amazing experience you don’t want to miss. If you’re ever in Tulum you should definitely book a yoga class here at Azulik. Eric was a wonderful teacher! Coming back for sure on our next visit.

The yoga and apothecary are amazing!  At The ancestor house  ray and maricarmen were so helpful. They have copal burning every  where. The smell is fantastic.  I will return! Sergio was a great yoga teacher.

We stayed at Azulik Tulum for our anniversary celebration and we had an amazing stay here. Karen at front desk was really helpful and made our check in process smooth. Leyda from Angels team, gave the grand tour of this beautiful place after our checkin.  You can get amazing jungle vibes along with the mesmerizing beach views

Azulik was a great experience for me and my significant other.  The Azulik team was able to take care of my special requests and make our stay unforgettable. A special shoutout to Regina who was amazing to work with. Regina was always available to answer or help with any questions I had regarding my stay and Tulum.   The Azulik experience is very unique and romantic if anyone is trying to get that vibe. The food is also bangin especially Breakfast!   Thank you to the Azulik team for making our stay special.

Indescribably serene. unique and beautiful setting integrated around the incredible hotel. Alejandro and manuel were very helpful with our luggage. Teresa, Regina and Eric went above and beyond making sure we had the best experience possible throughout our stay. Ana and Catalina gave two of the best massages we’ve ever had. We will be returning as soon as we can.  Incredible holiday.

La Zebra was wonderful! Especially Joss and Abdel - they were both so kind and helpful with anything my mother and I needed. The property and amenities are gorgeous, and the food is amazing. Definitely recommend the chef’s table with chef Bonilla - a once in a lifetime experience!  The only thing that could be improved is the food service - it would take quite a long time, even when the restaurant was empty.   Overall, an incredible visit and the kindest staff ever! I’ll be coming back :).

La Zebra is always amazing! Isaiah is so helpful with any request. We highly recommend staying here as the food and staff are all wonderful! They have their own private beach area with palapas and the staff come to you for orders. The drinks, food, and all staff are absolutely amazing!! We will be back!

My wife and I celebrated our honeymoon at La Zebra after getting married in Cancun the week prior. We had an amazing time and can't wait to be back. The entire team at La Zebra is top-notch and goes above and beyond to make you feel welcome during your stay.   Juan Carlos was incredibly gracious and helped check us into our beautiful room when we arrived and provided excellent restaurant recommendations throughout our stay. We are so happy that we re-booked a few of our restaurant reservations based on his awesome recommendations!   The beach was beautiful and well-maintained with incredible service.  Abraham took care of us at the beach every day and he did everything he could to make my wife and I feel well taken care of and extra special. Thank you, Abraham!   The food at the

Everything about this resort is phenomenal.   From the chic, stylish decor of our oceanfront room, to the location on a stretch of perfect beach, to the restaurant food (so inventive, flavorful, and well done), the kind, friendly, and helpful staff, and of course the excellent mixology bar on site. The location is absolutely ideal, and short stroll down the road will bring you to and endless number of fabulous beach bars, restaurants, and boutiques, 10/10 would return again.

Third time at La Zebra, after visits in 2009 (!) and 2021.   In 2009, this was a rustic, laid-back place in a sleepy village. Now Tulum is completely overdeveloped and so is La Zebra. The buildings are packed very tightly next to each other, so there are rooms which are better and worse - some lack privacy. It still is a nice place though and we enjoyed the seaview room with a balcony overlooking the restaurant, as well as one of the more private jungle room with a plunge pool (on the right hand side of the property). The restaurant is pretty good and really stands out where it comes to breakfast - there are simply no better breakfast burritos and acai bowls in Tulum.   More generally, I'm disappointed by Tulum which has been growing on steroids and is now overdeveloped,

Everything was perfect. The service was amazing, rooms were super clean and the food was delicious. Must try the ceviche!  The hotel does a wonderful job of clearing the seaweed from the beach. Juan Carlos was a gracious and superb host!

We just had another wonderful stay at La Zebra. The attention to detail is amazing, the food is top-notch, and the facilities are beautiful. It's a stunning location and the perfect blend of casual/family-friendly and deluxe. I'd like to say a special thank you to the concierge Carlos (Juan Carlos)  for all of his help. Highly recommended!

Beautiful place, great view, the best customer service.  Joss and the team are the best!  Always remembers your name, and giving great recommendations.  Will definitely book La zebra only next time I’m coming to Tulum.  Thank again :) Geva

We had an exceptional experience at La Zebra this April, traveling as two adults with a young teen. All of us were exceedingly impressed with the setting, quality of rooms/property, food, accommodations for families, and service. Here’s what we liked:  Setting: Couldn’t ask for a better location in Tulum. Set directly on the gorgeous beach, and with an advantageous locale in the larger Tulum beach area itself. Everyone on the property is friendly and the food is great (drinks are delicious but not very strong which is what we experienced in other locations as well throughout our vacation). We parked ourselves on the beach's lounging bed every day and blissed out on the beautiful view.

First and most importantly the staff at La zebra is so friendly. In particular I can’t say enough about  Ricardo and Isaias at the front desk. They both had so many great suggestions from restaurants to adventures, and they never hesitated to help us out. The property and rooms were also very clean and comfortable.

amazing service Ricardo was great super helpful enjoyed talking to him  Rooms beautiful beach and beds super pristine Enjoyed every bit Food was yummy and quick service drinks amazing favorite sangria

We are very grateful for the magical, unforgettable experience that is La Zebra! We chose this place for our honeymoon and we are so glad we did!!  We spent much of our time enjoying the delicious food in the restaurant.  The Restaurant team was so good to us- Mario, Guti, Santi, Fili, and others- all were very kind and fabulous. They treated us like family and went above and beyond to ensure that our stay was enjoyable and comfortable.  One of the things that stood out to us was the safe and well-maintained property. We felt completely at ease throughout our stay, knowing that the staff was taking great care to ensure our safety and comfort.  The tropical boho-style design of the hotel was breathtaking. We had such an amazing trip at La Zebra! The service was beyond exceptional and accommodations were very relaxing. our favorite server was Marco at the cabanas, he was on top of it and had great recs!

This hotel exceeded my expectation on all levels. The hotel is beautiful. The rooms are spacious with an amazing view to the beautiful turquoise sea of Tulum. The staff is friendly and efficient. We had a massage at the Spa, best massage, I had in a long time.  The location of the hotel is also very convenient in the middle of the zone with lots of small shops and restaurant. We had an amazing time and we will be back.

I really love spending a beach day at La Zebra. It is one of the best beach clubs for food, drinks and comfort. I love the decor, with so many places that are just black and white, I appreciate the Mexican art and details throughout the property. It’s my happy place :) The service is friendly and great. My friends and I hung out on a day bed sipping cocktails and enjoyed having lunch. I can’t wait to come back!

We came here for the day and rented a beach bed. It was a great spot food was good and serviced was amazing! Manager Will and his team really took great care of us. This is a chill spot to relax for the day!

We stayed at La Zebra for our honeymoon and had a lovely experience! We're very grateful to the concierges Juan Carlos, Isaías, Ricardo and Joss, along with the rest of the hotel staff, for their excellent service, help arranging tours, and recommendations for restaurants and outings. Our room was so comfortable, and the hotel has a great location right in the middle of Tulum Beach. Truly an unforgettable trip!

amazing atmospheric hotel and very nice and caring staff, especially the manager Ricardo. He was always helpful and very attentive. I also want to note the work of Joss at the reception, he was pleasant and smiling and always cheered me up. I saw a lot of reviews about the hotel, but I highly recommend this hotel to visit, the rest exceeded all my expectations

Everything about the stay was great. Staff was helpful and friendly throughout the stay. Really didn’t even need to leave the facility for anything! Would recommend to anyone. Thought and effort was accounted for whether it was the complimentary tea or attentiveness from all of the staff

We came for breakfast and the food was amazing. Jorge was our server and was awesome! We ended up moving to the lounge couches and hanging out for a few more drinks. Abraham took care of us and was very attentive, they surprised both of my friends for their birthdays and gave them a dessert and sang happy birthday. We will definitely be coming back here. 10/10 service and food!

This is hands down one of the best boutique hotels we have ever stayed in. Everything about our stay was wonderful. The hotel grounds are beautifully designed and the atmosphere is very relaxed. The beach is beautiful and the staff was relentlessly raking seaweed. Big thanks to Francisco from Reception who accommodated our wish to change rooms. Reception also organised babysitter services for us - super easy und straightforward. Rooms are beautifully furnished, housekeeping was exceptional, they also gave us softer pillows on request. The food was scrumptious and the service excellent. Special mention goes to waiters Marco and Isac who were super friendly, attentive and always up for some banter.  We have nothing negative to remark. If you are planning a trip to Tulum and it’s

German at the restaurant was so polite and so attentive. He made us feel at home and gave us great tips on sites to see. Also, he recommended that watermelon drink which will be my new obsession. Big fan of his.

Awesome little hotel with super friendly staff, great food and a lovely beach. We were here in May, so there’s quite a bit of sea weed on the beach which is however removed by the staff everyday. I definitely recommend this place!

Could not recommend a better hotel to experience the magic of Tulum! The hotel is on a lovely stretch of the beach close to, but not next to the ‘party’ hotels giving you plenty of opportunity to relax and enjoy! We visited in May where naturally the seaweed builds up but the hotel staff did an incredible job of clearing this as much as possible so that you can walk along the beach and swim the waters (take a walk down the beach and you will see this is far from the case at most other hotels)! "But, we are lucky, the room is already prepared.". That sounded "off" immediately. Coming to the room it was quite warm despite the AC blowing. That was the biggest issue for our stay. The best hotel in this area of Tulum. They have an amazing atmosphere. They clean up the beach daily so you can walk right into the ocean. It's the most lively hotel and beach area but still quiet and peaceful. Nicest hotel I've stayed at! Every single person that works at La Zebra was a pleasure to see. Isaiah at concierge was amazing, they all were I'm just terrible at remembering names. I highly recommend this place and I'd absolutely come back if I visit Tulum again. The rooms were impeccable.

Beto was absolutely wonderful by the beach everyday! Outstanding service, food, location, and hotel amenities. The staff is extremely attentive, personal, and kind. Highly recommend the hotel to anyone traveling to Tulum!

WOW! This was the best place I have ever stayed on a vacation or traveling! I know thats a big statement buts its true. The rooms were amazing, we had our own personal mini pool/tub outside of our room which was great for late night soak or morning dip. The beach beds are so comfy, the restaurant is AMAZING, the pool is refreshing and the mango margaritas are a must. Most of all, it was the staff that made our trip so beyond any expectations. Getting to know them throughout our stay was so fun! Joss at the front desk made La Zebra

Absolutely amazing hotel and amazing people working there made the experience! Abraham who served our breakfast every day is a gem of a human being and reason enough to stay here!

La Zebra truly offers an authentic and fabulous experience for anyone seeking a unique getaway.  The eco-friendly design of the hotel is remarkable. It seamlessly blends with the natural environment, showcasing a harmonious fusion of sustainability and style. We felt so taken care of during our stay. La Zebra was an incredible place to stay! From the moment you arrive, you’re well taken care of - a cocktail and seaside cabana greeted us immediately to entertain us while we waited for our room to be ready.   Our room itself was incredible, with an ocean view, private plunge pool, and massive double shower.   The little bits of hospitality the staff is constantly giving guests make you feel like a king/queen. Tea and chocolate waiting for you in your room when you return. Francisco and Joss were two specific employees who were outstanding, but we had great

Also had a massage yesterday, which was really good for getting at my knots in my back. Thank you to Beto and everyone for the best visit!

We had an amazing time at the beach club. The staff is friendly and attentive. The food is great and the drinks are delicious.  We’ll definitely look to stay here next time we’re in Tulum. Isaac was an amazing host and we’ll definitely be back.

We came to La Zebra for a weekend away. First time in Tulum. Th staff were very friendly. The rooms are clean and have stunning views of the beach. The beach area is immaculate, with staff clearing the sand of seaweed each morning before guests are awake.

Beautiful rooms. Plunge pool was amazing. Great food in the restaurant with excellent service from Abraham and Jairo. Concierge was always helpful with any requests or questions about transportation or sites to see.

Abraham the serve at the restaurant made my day! He is amazing ! He went above and beyond for us.   The hotel is amazing ! Very intimate. They are invested in making it their mission yo make us happy.

The hotel experience was excellent. The food was exceptional. Our room was  clean and nicely put together. The beach views were nice.. Abraham, Johnathan, and Jairo were very accommodating.

Johnathan and Issac were incredibly attentive and super friendly guys. La Zebra is very quaint and very attentive to all your needs. This is the second time staying here. Front desk staff, Issah and Carlos also made our stay seemless and easy.

La Zebra is the best boutique hotel for relaxation and the IG moments. The staff is incredible, the rooms are quaint and the FOOD is to die for.   Jonathan was our waiter the entire stay and cannot recommend him enough. He was friendly, quick service and we loved seeing a familiar face every day.   Can’t wait to come back’

Jonathan did everything he could and more to ensure my family and I had a great time. Will definitely visit again. My kid enjoyed her fish fingers and my wife the cocktails. I found the beach beds to be comfy, and the pool close by to both the beach and the restaurant was a plus.

Jonathan was the best server when we visited for a day. He was amazing and very accommodating with our kids. We spent the whole day at La Zebra using the pool and the beach beds. Food was excellent. Thanks Jonathan!

Jaime, Jonathan, Santi, and all of the other staff were absolutely amazing; the food is SO GOOD!! We had a room with our own swim up pool, and all the staff were helpful and even brought our drinks and food right up to us. I feel so relaxed thank you!!

Beautiful experience , amazing location , The staff out standing  very friendly and service professional and attentive DEFINITELY WE COMING BACK !!!!  Thank you Raphael for delicious  drinks on the beach !!!  Special thanks for the whole team of housekeeping to be always with positive actitud !!  Con amore Lily

Had the best time at the zebra bar and restaurant. My  Friend and I spent all day in the front cabanas with the best service. I the early evening, we enjoyed the  Most delicious drinks at their inner bar. the manager' Will, was very inviting I'm brought energy to the place.  A definite comeback.
Our stay here was amazing. The staff was very attentive. Abraham was great! Please look for him when you arrive. Highly recommend staying here. It’s family friendly and there are activities for kids.

This small property is a gem more so because of its people. Carlos & Joss upfront at the reception were super friendly and helpful, the entire staff at the property is super good. The food at the restaurants in the property were consistent and very good through your our stay. The property is family friendly.   It would have been an easy 5* rating only that on our first morning the hotel ran out of water for a good 3 hours, we were jet lagged from over 2 days of air travel before reaching the property only to get up in the morning with the taps running dry. Staff was very attentive and respectful.   They really got to know the guests individually.   Really nice rooms with double rain shower and private dipping pool.  First time in Talum. Zebra was more mellow and tranquil.  A great escape in between great times with friends staying els

This is the cutest boutique resort ever.  The suites are well appointed and absolutely beautiful!  The beach is well cared for and the cabanas are a huge plus.  Although the beach is public, it feels private, especially in the evenings.  The food is great and I can’t say enough positive things about the service.  Jonathan was our server both on the beach and in the restaurant and he was very attentive, kind, and helpful.  He made our experience extra special.  We traveled with another family and our kids found the resort to be just as enjoyable as we did.  Will definitely return.

Amazing!  Beautiful setting and an outstanding experience.  The staff does a wonderful job making sure your every need is met with a smile!  Delicious food and great cocktails.  Very family friendly. Truly an amazing small boutique hotel. The facilities are in tip top shape.  Our 5 night stay was perfect.  We will definitely be back!

Had a wonderful time at Ahau. It's a wonderful establishment that is small and boutique. Staff is like family. Everything taken care off, beautiful premises and great food. Thanks! We'll certainly go back next year for another run.

What an amazing experience! We had so much fun and were blown away by all of the staff! Tanet at the front desk was absolutely amazing, she was always there to help! Berna at the lobby bar and restaurant was so very friendly and made out experience that much more! We also did a romantic dinner on the beach which was perfect! Our waiters Jonny and Carlos were the best ever! We are booking again today too come back and stay!

Emanuel, Omar and all others were always making sure we were having fun and had everything we needed.  Ahau was such a charming hotel made the stay incredible. Then Tulum was amazing with great food fest places definitely a come back place.

Hector explained us all about Mezcal, history, production and differences between different Mezcal. He taught us how to drink and appreciate it. We will never forget this experience. I would definitely recommend this beach as service, food and amenities are all 5 stars. Of course the sea view is amazing.

Amazing hospitality and drinks! Perfectly nestled between the beach the tulum tourism district.  I will definitely be returning in the near future. When you come look for Jesus he will take care of you!

Ahau was amazing!! Tulum Transportation drove us to and from the resort and were friendly. The front staff was also very flexible in making adjustments for our trip, and they helped us make several reservations. The wait staff and maids were fantastic and responsive. 10/10 resort and experience!

Very nice service, nice people. We really felt welcome here. The view from the room was incredible. Excellent experience!  Great room service, and very delicious food. Also, the communication was very great, and they always answered really fast. Only bad thing was one rainy night, when the rain came inside.

Sergio was our waiter during our stay and he was a star! He memorised our names instantly and greeted us like long lost friends whenever we saw him! Great service and always with a smile . He’s a great asset to the hotel.

My family and I booked 3 rooms at Ahau beach tulum for my wedding nearby. From day one we were taken care of by the friendly staff. Emanuel is the man!! Most excellent service and ambiance. Beds & pillows are amazingly comfortable. Food is delicious, with gorgeous beach views. Muchos gracias Tanet, Elisabeth, Fernando & Monserrat - a great experience!

Only went for the bar but great cocktails, easy food and Juan gave us the best service possible. Will return, probably to stay at the hotel since the location is so good. Hard to find places as good as this on the beach.

Amazing place, amazing staff, amazing food.  Everything is perfect, walking distance of nice restaurants and the beach is absolutely gorgeous. You can not find a better place to rest and enjoy some beach time.

I’ve been to tulum 4 times and Ahau is the only place I will ever stay if I’m staying on the beach in tulum!! You don’t even need to leave the premises! The location is directly centered by all the other restaurants and beach clubs/ nightclubs. The premises is like out of a tropical movie and the rooms are like treehouses bungalows only steps away from the beach!

This place is amazing . Just spent my 30th here and Tanet was just so accommodating and made things super easy for us at check in and also for check out . We never had to think about carrying our bags or stressing about transportation . I loved this place . Also you are going to want to leave and try other restaurants and I can tell you to not waste your time . This place has the best food ! Just get here and don’t leave !  Also ask for Omar on the beach ! Amazing server

We had a lovely stay! The property is stunning and the rooms are very unique. We spent 3 nights and feel rejuvenated to return home. There are different spiritual events you can participate in that are really well-done. Would definitely recommend!

If you are looking for a place to eat lunch, go somewhere else. We waited a whole hour for our even though there wasn’t even the restaurant were almost only half full. The burger was avarage, to overpriced in my opinion. Almost burned even though I asked for medium cooked. The staff was friendly and the view to the beach was beautiful. Nice location.

My trip to ahau was just amazing ! I’ve been returning to this beautiful hotel since 20 years , and every time gets better . The food is simply the best food in Tullum by far, and reasonable in price , compared to the other rip off hotels . I spent over two weeks there in Jan , and I must say the staff are just so extra special, never in my life i meet such incredible staff ,Eli on reception , who was always there for me , and amazing Carla  the manager , there to make reservations for me , helping me to plan my trip , and dealing with all my needs . I consider the team at ahau family , and due to this , will return every year .  Thank you Eli and Carla :) I can’t wait to return next January  Francesca

Nely was great for us today at the beach! Fish tacos were bomb. Beach was good. Waves were large but we enjoyed a afternoon here. Make sure to walk around the area super cute and inviting area. Be ready to spend some money cause it’s pricey. Mango Margarita was pretty good.

It was so bad the manager, Carla, said she'd refund us the last two nights of our reservation so we paid for another hotel. We had an absolute amazing stay at this resort. Not only is it incredible beautiful and cozy the staff treated us like family and we felt extremely welcomed. Eli and the staff are amazing! They looked after us 24/7 anything we needed was provided and arranged.  The food and service was great. We also did a yoga class that was amazing.  I can’t say enough good positive things about this resort. We will definitely come back many times.

Lovely stay at Ahau! The accommodations, food, drinks, service, and ambiance were excellent.  We especially enjoyed the good music and entertainment at the beach club. Special thanks to Emanuele for going above and beyond to accommodate our needs to ensure a great experience.

Once arriving, the front office was very warm and kind. They answered all of our questions. When we needed something they were there to help out. Rooms were great! Housekeeping cleaned everything. AC doesn't stay on all day due to saving energy but they are willing to leave it on if you ask them

A great place to stay in the heart of Tulum.  Great warm welcoming staff that is eager to please. We recommend the ocean front room with the sound of the ocean to put you to sleep.  The restaurant serves fresh delicious food. . Our stay was very enjoyable

Our first time here. The room was stunning overlooking the ocean, the staff was friendly and attentive. I especially loved our waiter Sergio! The relaxed vibe and beautiful hang here is special. Will definitely return. Julieta is worth returning for alone. Her massage was transformative. She has a gift. My only disappointment here was the late night noise from neighboring clubs . Luckily the sound of ocean waves offset it somewhat, but I imagine a ground floor room would be quieter. Otherwise top notch all around.

Had such an amazing day at this beach club. The drinks and food are amazing, and the view is breathtaking. Our waiter, Reyes, took care of us all day and was the best waiter we’ve had on this vacation! Absolutely a must to come to this beach club, and ask for Reyes!!!

I had the best experience in Tulum at Ahau ! great gastronomy and the best service with Sergio at the bar restaurant. The view at the Master Suite is just extraordinary. Top level TULUM experience. Thanks for all.

Beachfront with excellent drinks and service by Reyes! All of the staff is incredibly friendly and attentive, would absolutely recommend. Many nice amenities and in a great location. Ask for Reyes you won’t be disappointed!

First off, let me say that this by far was the friendliest service I’ve ever encountered on vacation in Tulum. I would love to give a big thank you to Reyes for treating me and my girls like queens.  Anything we needed, was provided in a timely manner.    The atmosphere was inviting and calm. The variety and quality of food and drinks was by far the best.  Amazing margaritas and mouthwatering Caribbean ceviche.  I promised myself I’d be coming back to AHAU every time I’m in Tulum.    Thank you Reyes and Juan for such amazing service   -Laura

The beach club is a must! It was 5 of us and the food was delicious. Our server, Reyes was absolutely amazing! He made sure our drinks were always full and we were super comfortable the entire time we were there. 10/10 recommend you will not be disappointed!

Ahau was lovely for breakfast! You can’t beat the view and breeze. The staff was amazing. Our Server, Sergio, went above and beyond for us. He made our dinner experience enjoyable with his great energy and hospitality. We will definitely return to experience this hotel again and look forward to Sergio serving us again!

This was my first time in Mexico and I must say that the staff at Ahau Tulum was awesome, especially the restaurant and bar staff. Carlos and Jesus made us feel at home. They made me laugh which is difficult...lol. Their service was 1st class and whenever we visit Tulum again, we're definitely staying at the Ahau Tulum. Hopefully they'll be there because I'm asking for them by name.   -Jason

We came for a beach day here. Very chill place, good music and good service. Facility has pool, beach bar, showers etc. Also, they have famous art pieces. Ricky made our day, he was very helpful, friendly and everything was on time.  Highly recommend!

We spent the day at the beach club. Jesus our server was fantastic. Food was amazing. I ordered a arrachera. The drinks were also amazing. The place is a little expensive but it’s worth it. Next time we will stay at this hotel!

BEST SERVICE we loved all of the staff at Ahau. They were extremely helpful and friendly, especially servers Sergio and Jesus at the beautiful restaurant/bar with a beachfront view. Our room was cleaned every day and coffee was delivered in the morning at 8:30am, it was amazing. Beachfront is the best way to go when booking your room, but wherever you are it’s great jungle vibes. Raw cafe is also delicious at the hotel. Highly recommend, we miss it already.

Great service and attention by Waiter Armando, the view and the food was great, which means the time and money was well spent. We are looking forward to coming back sometime soon. Thank you for the service!

First thing in the morning we called the manager (Muntse) (sp?) and she came in with like, 8 guys and took it out, brought in a dehumidifier and everything was very pleasant after that. The room looked over the ocean and was always clean.  The food and the service

All of the staff is great, loved the young front desk woman and the chef makes AMAZING food! Sergio is great and friendly! He remembered my name, helped me with my order and with my Spanish. Thanks for making my time here special!

Excellent place the staff was AMAZING. Please go visit this nice shaded area with a full view of beach it’s a must see besides the statue you’ll love it up!!! The view was amazing as well make it a stop!!!!

Berna was an amazing waiter, he really took good care of my friends and I and made sure we were good at all times. Will be coming back . Ask for BERNA . He will make sure you have a great time and want to come back.

We had a great experience and stay. The rooms were beautiful and clean, the vibes were very Tulum and the drinks were deliciously craft just like the food. We had an issue with our room door locking and the staff accommodated us quickly and upgraded to a nicer room. Staff is very friendly and welcoming. We will be back. Thank you!!

Enjoyed my stay, service very good  Jorge and Ana really looked after us, made sure we had everything we needed  And claudio was helpful, the restaurant had the best drinks, I’ll never forget the strawberry margarita!  I’d 100% come back to the copal Tulum

The facilities were very clean and quaint.  The staff was lovely.  Enjoyed resting by pool and the yoga class.  Enjoyed the proximity between beach and town.  I would come and stay at Copal Tulum again.  Feel refreshed and relaxed and ready to go back to states.

I spent most of my day begging for the bare minimum. We were dismissed, ignored and made fun of. I felt it was hazardous and even slipped on my bathroom floor. I fell and as a 75 year old woman, it was bad. I was afraid I broke my elbow and dislocated my kneecap. Thankfully we are leaving tomorrow, I broke down crying and they finally brought ice , towels and mats but no water. Some of the staff were lovely but mostly indifferent and disorganized.

It was nice, easy to get a taxi. Hotel very beautiful. Hotel staff very helpful and friendly. Many things close by like restaurants and activities. But taxi is expensive so negotiate prices.  Make sure to also pack bug spray, there are a lot of insects

Really nice accomodations. The hotel restaurants are really good too - both the Mexican place and the Sushi place. I will say that if you get the rooms with the private pool, make sure you pay attention at night because they may or may not be well lit outside!

Our stay was amazing, the hotel is so cute and has a nice layout with different room options.  Claudio and Anna were amazing help!   Erik was great help in the outdoor pool area and provided great service!

This property is BEAUTIFUL! Very friendly staff. Upon checkout, we've already reserved another night next week. Jorge, Claudio, and Jasmine are all so accommodating. I'd highly recommend staying here!

What a fabulous hotel. Everything here is relaxed and relaxing. The front desk staff are friendly and welcoming, and everyone is helpful and kind. Special shout out to Ana who helped us when we arrived and checked out. The swimming pools are clean and beautiful, the food is good and if you have the means, check out the Kokoro Japanese restaurant. Hands down the best sushi I ever had.  The only down side is the hotel is a little removed from the center and taxis are expensive (200MXP one way or 400 to the beach) but it’s a 15-min walk to the center  through the local neighborhood which is totally fine. The hotel also has bikes for rent. Hope to make it back one day!

Beautiful hotel everyone was extremely friendly and polite Ana and Johnny in particular. Food was excellent breakfast lunch and dinner. Great location close to everything. The pools were amazing also especially the roof top. Gym also really nice enough in there to get your work out done. Would 100% recommend if staying in Tulum

I stayed in this hotel after seeing some good tiktoks. The hotel has a great ambiance and vibe that you want to see when you come to Tulum but that was it. the food was good at the restaurants on site. Enjoy the past stay, it's an amasing ambiance with wonderful views and and incredilble staff, specially Ana, Claudio, Jorge and Jazmín who welcome us and made us feel like if we where un home. Continue like that amazing job.

Thank you very much Hotel Copal Tulum! Congratulations! 1000%.

Amazing experience, dreamlike boutique hotel. You could smell Copal incense 24x7, and there were so many relaxing activities. The concierge Betty was so kind, she recommended we take a massage at “The healing spot”….  It makes you whole again.

Everyone was amazing, our server at the breakfast was really good and the guy at the bar upstairs too, also front desk Claudio, Rosalia y Jazmine were very helpful with everything. Amazing experience will definitely come back

Beautiful people , beautiful room , all the food was vey very good , beautiful roof top pool , very close to the street life. Overall my experience here was great and will definitely be returning. Full with so much culture and everyone is really really nice

It was amazing, staff were really helpful great ambience and service  The pools were amazing service and fantastic and clean  Great room sizes and fresh fruit and water  Really amazing staff helped with all my queries

The hotel grounds are amazing, hotel staff, AMAZING; from Claudio, Rafael and everyone else we encountered just outstanding customer service.   The food at the international restaurant was also amazing, everything we ordered was absolutely delicious.   This location is a nice relaxing hotel!!

The hotel is beautiful. Both pools are spectacular.  The customer service is fast and responsive. They are all very friendly.   They have scooter rentals which we highly recommend! They make your stay in tulum very convenient.

The hotel is beautiful and has a great atmosphere. Great pools great vegetation, staff was great. I really recommend staying here. Close the the city center which is very great. Thank you for everything

Amazing ambiance, very peaceful stay. They will do anything you ask of them. All of the staff is very helpful. They were very honest and helpful with changes that we needed in our room. They even provided us bud spray

We had a lovely time here. Felt like we were staying in the jungle, the staff was very friendly and helpful. We were walking distance from El Centro so going out to town was extremely easy.  I would definitely stay here again.

Me and my fiancée  came to stay with my family and it was amazing, really good Atención especially by  Rafael, Betty ,Claudio, ana and Jose , very attentive and nice , will return and very much worth it

I had a great experience during our trip. The hotel is very nice and is definitely a great time for a getaway. I would not bring Kids but for a more intimate trip with your spouse, partner or even you close friend I’ll definitely recommend.

Beautiful place! Quiet, peaceful, and very helpful staff (Claudio was so welcoming!). Great food and sushi on site and super clean and modern room. Infinity pool was gorgeous and the whole place looked just like the pictures!

CLAUDIO is AMAZING and very attentive. CLAUDIO always greets you with smile and is willing to assist in any way possible. Book your own transportation and you'll save about 50%.

Beautiful place , with lovely staff. Clean.                   I really enjoyed my stay with my friends. The room service was quick and good. I’ll definitely will be back and recommend it to my friends and family !!!!

The hotel is close to downtown Tulum, Super Aki supermarket but a little out the way from downtown Tulum and Tulum beach (15 min taxi for 600-700 pesos). The rooftop infinity pool is gorgeous.
